description:
Rangiku and the members of the Women’s Soul Reaper Association take a relaxing trip to a beach in the World of the Living. All the women are excited about wearing bathing suits that they have picked out for the occasion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu Da! Umi Da! Mizugi Matsuri!!
Été et mer ! Le festival des maillots de bain !
夏だ! 海だ! 水着祭!!
